docs.lead_paragraph: -week-old baby to Dr. Nathan Firestone for a checkup, he does not examine the newborn or answer questions right away. First he discusses the use of an infant car seat. In soft and soothing voice, the pediatrician tells them that injuries suffered while riding in cars are responsible for the deaths of more young children than any disease or other type of accident. More than 700 children under the age of 5 are killed on the roads each year; more than 70,000 are injured.

headline.main: Experts Stress Need for Child Seats
